title: GoSports Dry Erase Rollzee and Farkle Scoreboard - Giant Size with 2 Pens
features: 2 GAMES IN 1: This double-sided board has 2 games in 1 with Rollzee on one side and Farkle on the other for endless fun (game instructions included); Keep score for up to 6 players
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Measuring 6.5 in x 10 in, this robust design can stand up to spills and will not deteriorate or fly away like paper
REUSABLE: Includes 2 dry-erase markers (red and black) and the large dry-erase surface wipes off easily you can use it again and again with zero waste
PLAY ANYWHERE: Great for pairing with giant dice for outdoor use on holiday weekends, weddings, camping and more! Also perfect for inside use with regular sized dice
description: Tired of throwing away sheet after sheet of paper and having to frequently buy new scorecards? GoSports Dry-Erase Rollzee and Farkle Scoreboard comes with 2 dry erase markers and can be used again and again so the fun never has to end. The double-sided board has Rollzee one side and Farkle on the other (instructions included), making the board the perfect addition to outdoor festivities. With scoring space for up to 6 players, the whole family can play!.

title: SWOOC Games - 5 Pack of Yardzee & Farkle Scorecards +Markers
